A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Storyboard and dialogue (script) were terrible. Visuals\, costume design\, set design were great. It would immeadiately be a much better movie with half as many characters. Use that money for better writers. Good scenes were ruined by horrible scenes. Even the soundtrack was rushed and jumpy. Overall shows poor directing and lack of vision. C+ movie made worse by so much wasted potential.
